name: REMAIN .
description:
You're special. One of a kind. 

A game made in under 48 hours for the 2019 Game Maker's Toolkit Jam

CONTROLS

Press 'W A S D' to walk.

Press 'SPACE' to dash.

TRAILEROTHER GAMES

If you'd like to see our other take on unconventional survival games, consider PHYTOCENE CYCLE. Made for the Third Extra Credits Game Jam

If you like humans killing each other, give KILL THE KING, our entry for the first Extra Credits game jam, a try.
